title: [HOLD for payment 2023-03-16] [$2000] Web - Emoji - There is no tooltip for the category picker
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Log in with any account
3. Go to any conversation
4. Select emoji option
5. Hovering on one of the option

Expected result: When hovering over one of the category pickers, a tooltip containing the name of the category should appear.

Actual result: None
